sourcesContent:
import React from 'react'; import { Container, Row, Col, Image, Form, Button } from 'react-bootstrap'; import Images from './Images'; import '../css/loan.css'; import '../plugins/loan'; export default function Loan() { return ( <>

You can easily get an Instant Loan here

When you want?
Select the Rating system which you want to apply
Upload Aadhar Card or Driving License or Voter Id Card or Passport
Upload Pen Card
Upload Residencial Proof
Upload Application written by yourself
Upload Passport Size Photo
); }
